blogPost.excerpt: Graze is the first true Video Based Social Networking App. Why waste endless time messaging and going on disappointing dates? Instead, you can spend 5 minutes or less on a Video Chat to find out if you have chemistry and a dynamic worth exploring in person.
blogPost.body: Graze is the first true Video Based Social Networking App. Why waste endless time messaging and going on disappointing dates? Instead, you can spend 5 minutes or less on a Video Chat to find out if you have chemistry and a dynamic worth exploring in person.
blogPost.title: Graze - Video first social networking for dating & meeting friends
blogPost.author: Heather Hopkins

localize.description: Graze是第一个真正的基于视频的社交网络应用。为什么要浪费无尽的时间发信息和进行令人失望的约会？相反，您可以花5分钟或更少的时间进行视频聊天，看看你们是否有化学反应和值得亲自探索的动态。
localize.tagline: 视频第一社交网络的约会和认识朋友

localize.description: Graze是第一個真正的基於視頻的社交網絡應用。爲什麼要浪費無盡的時間發信息和進行令人失望的約會？相反，您可以花5分鐘或更少的時間進行視頻聊天，看看你們是否有化學反應和值得親自探索的動態。
localize.tagline: 視頻第一社交網絡的約會和認識朋友

previous.excerpt: We have developed a simple web app that lets you find apps on Google Play Store that have high download numbers (100,000+) but poor rating. This is a great business opportunity for anyone who can build a better app and monetize it by providing a paid version
previous.title: 1000 Business Ideas - 1000 validated app ideas

localize.description: 我们已经开发了一个简单的网络应用，让你在Google Play Store上找到下载量大（100,000+）但评分差的应用。这对于任何能够建立一个更好的应用程序并通过提供付费版本来盈利的人来说都是一个很好的商机。
我們已經開發了一個簡單的網絡應用，讓你在Google Play Store上找到下載量大（100,000+）但評分差的應用。這對於任何能夠建立一個更好的應用程序並通過提供付費版本來盈利的人來說都是一個很好的商機。

next.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
next.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes

localize.description: Webiny是一个开源框架，可以帮助开发者在无服务器基础设施之上架构、构建和部署应用。Webiny还附带了一个无服务器CMS，运行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建无服务器应用程序和网站

localize.description: Webiny是一個開源框架，可以幫助開發者在無服務器基礎設施之上架構、構建和部署應用。Webiny還附帶了一個無服務器CMS，運行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建無服務器應用程序和網站
